main event: A witness reported seeing an extremely bright object in the sky that diminished in light intensity and size rapidly, ultimately becoming part of a formation of four objects in a box pattern.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 10 minutes., The witness initially saw one bright object that quickly grew and was joined by three more similar objects., The sighting occurred at night., The objects were difficult to see due to buildings obstructing the view., The witness was a 32-year-old radar instructor at Keesler AFB.
sighted object: four extremely bright objects in the sky
witness description: Civilian, 32 years old, occupation radar instructor at Keesler AFB Technical Schools.
